modName: YY Anim Replacer - Mystic Knight's animations for 2H weapons
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]READ THE DESC. pls[/size]



All credits goes to the creator of YY Anim Replacer - Mystic Knight  (yukl)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33914/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33914/?[/url]

[b]Description:
[/b]This mod makes the animations of Mystic Knight mod to be used with twohanded swords.
I'd just simply renamed some files so that it can be used with 2h.

[b]Required file/mod:[/b]
For this to work(especially those awesome equip/unequip animations) you'll need to download:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59006/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59006/?[/url]  (This mod makes the twohanded swords be sheathed on the hips/waist, this mod is a must if you want the equip/unequip animations.)
[b]

btw, there are some animations from the Mystic Knight mod that can't be implemented to the Two Handed weapons.
[/b]i dont which cuz im not using this thing currently
author: nosepicker
